dcterms:creator: J. Anderson
dcterms:description: The Indian Pines dataset is acquired by the Airborne Visible/Infrared Imaging Spectrometer (AVIRIS) sensor over northwestern Indiana, USA, comprising 145×145 pixels with a ground sampling distance of 20 m and 220 spectral bands in the wavelength range from 400 nm to 2500 nm.
dcterms:title: Indian Pines Dataset

dcterms:creator: B. Rasti
D. Hong
R. Hang
P. Ghamisi
X. Kang
J. Chanussot
J. Benediktsson
dcterms:description: The Pavia University dataset is acquired by the Reflective Optics System Imaging Spectrometer (ROSIS) sensor, consisting of 610 × 340 pixels with 103 spectral bands covering the spectral range from 430 nm to 860 nm.
dcterms:title: Pavia University Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Kang
D. Hong
J. Liu
G. Baier
N. Yokoya
B. Demir
dcterms:description: The Houston2013 dataset was collected using the ITRES CASI-1500 sensor over the campus of University of Houston and its surrounding rural areas, consisting of 349×1905 pixels with 144 spectral bands ranging from 364 nm to 1046 nm.
dcterms:title: Houston2013 Dataset
